wikipedia_page.main: Ben Watson (born 20 March 1990) is a British weightlifter from Oxfordshire. He competed for England in the men's 105 kg event at the 2014 Commonwealth Games where he won a bronze medal.

response: Ben Watson or Benjamin Watson may refer to:
*Ben Watson (footballer, born July 1985), English footballer with Charlton Athletic
*Ben Watson (footballer, born December 1985), English footballer with St Martins
*Ben Watson (music writer) (born 1957), British Marxist writer on music
*Ben Watson (politician) (born 1959), American politician in the Georgia State Senate
*Ben Watson, 2014 Commonwealth Games Bronze medalist in weightlifting (105 kg Category)
